name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles STURDIVANT, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles STURDIVANT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Mozenter, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., James Jordan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
436 A.2d 129
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Charles STURDIVANT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 20, 1981.
Decided Oct. 30, 1981.
Robert B. Mozenter, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., James Jordan, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
